---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API Overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        '200':
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/MyWrongObject"
components:
  schemas:
    MyObject:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
